arch=arm
baudrate=115200
board=odroid-c4
board_name=odroid-c4
boot_mtd=booti
bootdelay=5
cpu=armv8
fdt_addr=0x08008000
dtb_emmc_block=10010
dtb_max_blk_count=c8
loadaddr=0x1000000
kernel_emmc_block=1010
kernel_max_blk_count=F000
ramdisk_addr=0x13000000
ramdisk_emmc_block=100D8
ramdisk_max_blk_count=7D000
fdtfile=amlogic/meson-sm1-odroid-c4.dtb
set_bootargs=setenv bootargs "console=${console},${baudrate} root=/dev/ram rw earlycon loglevel=7"
loadimage=usb read ${loadaddr} ${kernel_emmc_block} ${kernel_max_blk_count};
loadfdt=usb read ${fdt_addr} ${dtb_emmc_block} ${dtb_max_blk_count};
loadramdisk=usb read ${ramdisk_addr} ${ramdisk_emmc_block} ${ramdisk_max_blk_count};
scriptaddr=0x08000000
soc=meson
stderr=serial
stdin=serial
stdout=serial
vendor=amlogic
ipaddr=192.168.3.2
netmask=255.255.255.0
serverip=192.168.3.10
image=Image
fdt_file=meson64_odroidc4.dtb
ramdisk=rootfs.cpio.uboot
loadtftpimage=tftp ${loadaddr} ${image};
loadtftpfdt=tftp ${fdt_addr} ${fdt_file};
loadtftpramdisk=tftp ${ramdisk_addr} ${ramdisk};
boot_emmc=usb start; run loadimage;run loadramdisk;run loadfdt; ${boot_mtd} ${loadaddr} ${ramdisk_addr} ${fdt_addr};
nfs_boot_args=setenv bootargs console=tty0 console=ttyAML0,115200n8 root=/dev/nfs ip=192.168.3.2:192.168.3.10::255.255.255.0::eth0:both nfsrootdebug nfsroot=192.168.3.10:/home/uic56995/nfs/odroid_c4_nfs,v3,tcp,rw
boot_tftp=run nfs_boot_args; run loadtftpimage; run loadtftpfdt; ${boot_mtd} ${loadaddr} - ${fdt_addr};
bootcmd=run boot_tftp
